channel.title: Need help getting client to work for others
channel.description: I set up a server and posted the client. I can log into the server with ease but I tried to get my friend on and it always said "error connecting to server". I was wondering if I had to link the client to the server or something since nobody else will be downloading the server. I set up no-ip for it and even but the ip into the file in the source folder. Please help!

item.title: Need help getting client to work for others
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You have to have a client with local host for you and one with the ip of the server for everyone else

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting client to work for others

I set up a server and posted the client. I can log into the server with ease but I tried to get my friend on and it always said “error connecting to server”.
